TopicTitle: How many missions are in progress?

Articles.Content: Do you concentrate on your Kerbaled Jool tour, a base on Moho, or do you feel can't miss one planetary window? So far, I've been unable to resist multiple windows and usually end up having a few going to different planets. No screenshots of huge space stations or bases coming from me soon. That and there is always a new rocket to try.

Too many. 8 ships are going to laythe at the moment, the first phase of colonizing the Joolian system. Well rather establishing a permanent presence there since at best there will be a dozen kerbals there. One around Eve waiting for a Kerbin return window. A munbase, two space stations in Kerbin space and a kethane base on duna which waits for a lander, tanker and surface rover. Those three are still waiting for a transfer window. There's also a probe to Eeloo which will definitely not get into orbit around it as I forgot to adjust the delta-v for the highly unusual orbit of Eeloo.
30 missions in progress, mostly because my ships don't come back
Over 20, I have a lot of abandoned ships (Mun Base, Space Station, etc...) and like 10 Flags.
I had over 50... Then I had to get a new save file so now I have like 10...
59 missions so far. Been bumping up and down from 60 since I'm trying to make a SSTO space plane to work.

6.

5 is an work in progress satellite network in Kerbin and 1 is a Mun rover.

I started it yesterday so it's pretty small.

120 or so,last time I paid attention. That's from many game years of leaving probes and used landers at all the planets and moons, plus ongoing active missions.

But I haven't gone back to many of them since I switched to version 0.20, so I expect many would appear underground and explode violently if I did.
